findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights limits the ability to verify compliance with confidentiality obligations and monitor the handling of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to uncertainties regarding the ownership and usage rights of any intellectual property created during the engagement.
The indemnification clause places the onus on the Receiving Party for breaches, which can lead to significant financial liabilities without clear limitations.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law for all claims arising from breach of this Agreement.
